unnormalised: Okay, konn tori Bharotantle soglleant gon'dhollachea patteachea vixoyant vicharlem? Bhai, hanv tuka sangtam, tem eka khorea sasnachea bhokrantlean vochunchea bhaxen asa. Dilli trafficantlean aplek vatt sodun kaddop kitlench kathinn dista? Thoddeam sorkari patteanchi nodar korunk prayatn kor.
normalised: Barabor, konnain tori Bharotantle soglleant gondaigellea porthavyachea vixoyant prosn kelo? Bhai, hanv tuka sangtam, tem ek khorem khobol'lem zaga. Tuka dista Dillechea trafikantlean vat sodhun kaddop kotthin asa? Him kain adhikrut porthavim ukolpache yotn korun porya.

unnormalised: Poileach suvater, tunvem sankshipt roopam vaprunk zai. "Rd" mhunnje "Road" vo "Reserved District"? "Ngr" mhunnje "Nagar" vo khorea "Nagar"ache laginchea vaimanikak thakay divpi vishay? Ani magir tumak plot-anche number asat. Tum Plot No. 24/B/3-A sodhtole, Sector 62, Noida, 201307 hanga kiteim tori asat, ani Greater Noidaant sampdutole, jivnacho nirnnoi dukhichya rupan kartole.
normalised: Poilem mhunnllear, tuka sankhepanchi dekh-rekh korchi poddtoli. “R-d” mhunnllear “Road” vo “Reserved District”? “N-g-r” mhunnllear “Nagar” vo khorea zambal'leam vattant *Nagara* lagim asa? Magir tuka plotache ank asat. Tumi plotacho ank ekees chovvis slash B slash tin A sodhtole, Sector soshtti don Noida-nt konnachea tori zagear, don shunya ek tin shunya sat, ani zori tumi Greater Noida-nt ravtale, tumche jivnantle vinchun kaddeleamvixim prosn korit.

unnormalised: Ani hanvak land-markanchea vixoyant utsah divonk nako. "Puran'nea Peepal zhaddache lagin". Khub borem! Konnem? UP-antle dor ek-ek rastyachea konn'near eka puran'nea Peepal zhaddam asat. Vo "Hanuman Mandirache vireedh". Portun, madotkorok, punn Bharotachea zaitea bhagamni nirupyogi! Mhojem khasgi vokhut ashi, "SBI Bankache fatlean". Konnachi shaakha, yaar? Mumbai-antuch 100 SBI shakha asat!
normalised: Ani hanv landmarkanche vixoyantlean survat korinaka. "Puraton peepal rukhachea lagim". Borem! Konn? U-P-ntlea her eka vattanchea konxeak ek puraton peepal rukh asa. Vo “Hanuman Mondirachea samkar”. Punha, upyogi, punn Bharotachea zaitea bhagant virchit! Mhojea svatahchea ruchik, “S-B-I banke fattim”. Kanchi shakha, yaar? Mumbai-nt ekuch ek S-B-I shakha asat!

unnormalised: Magir tumak postal code asat. 400001 sopem dista, punn Fort, Mumbai chea vostavik rastyantlean utrun vhodde imarot sodun kaddpachem? Dev tuka madot korunk. Tuka ek GPS, ek Sherpa, ani sombhavit rupan eka upcharachea uprantachya satrant zai poddttolem.
normalised: Magir tumkam postal kod asat. char sozar ani ek sompe disunk xoktat, punn Mumbai-chea Fort-ache khorea vattentlean cholun bori imarat sodhun kaddchea khatir? Borem bhag. Tumkam ek G-P-S, ek Sherpa ani poryan eka therapy sobaichi garoz poddtoli.

unnormalised: Oh, ani Dev madot kortalo zann tuka, patto eka ganvant asat. "Ganv: Rampur, Post Office: Chandni Chowk, District: Biharantle kiteim, Pin: 800001". Tem mhunnje tandullachea guddoyantlea eka tandullachya kanachya sodachi kosso pratn korpak sarkhem asa. Ani Google Maps tujea mitraichem aschem mhunn apeksha korunk nako. Tem sombhavit rupan tuka gayanchea khetrakhatir marg darshan kortolem.
normalised: O, ani Dev tumkam modot korun tor porthavo eka ganvant asa. "Ganv: Rampur, Post Office: Chandni Chowk, Jillo: Bihar-ant konnachea tori zagear, Pin: atth sozar ani ek". Tem bhattantlea bhattachea dhanyantlean nirkhall dhanyachi bhetto divunk sodhtaleachem porim zata. Ani Google Maps tumcho ixtt asa mhunn apexa korinaka. Tem tumkam gaienche shetachim margdorxon kortolem.

unnormalised: Ekda hanvak ek package "C/O The Block Development Officer, Kiteim, Kiteim, District: XYZ, Pin: 700001" hankam paavonk poddlem. Hanvem sapath ghetlea, hanvem panch vorsham vaddovle, fakta Block Development Officer sodun kaddpak pratn korunk. To sombhavit rupan package paavpaak yevpeankatlean lupoun ravlo asat. Hushar monis.
normalised: Hanv eke pavtti ek package “C slash O The Block Development Officer, konnachea tori zagear, konnachea tori zagear, Jillo: X-Y-Z, Pin: sat sozar ani ek” haka divunk poddtalo. Hanv sopot gheta, mhaka Block Development Officer-ak sodhun kaddchea prayatnant panch vorshanchem vay zalem. To zori package divunk yetat tankam lipoun ravl'lo astolo. Huzar monis.

unnormalised: Mhunntak, Bharoti patto utrun vochpachem ek adventsher asa. Eka niras, vela lagpi, bud'dhi parikhka adventsher, punn adventsher astach. Fakta udok, dheer, ani bore haseyacho arths vaprunk yaad dovrak. Tuka tem zai poddttalem. Ani ek bribe pachi bhurgeancha chai wallahak divonk poddtalem. Te samany rupan sogllem vollkhota.
normalised: Ten'na, ho Bharoti porthavo nirikxonn korop ek sohas. Ek uttejit, vell ghevpi, dhirya parakhnnecho sohas, punn ek sohas zori torui. Fuddem tuka udok, dhir ani konnachench tori bore vicharanchi garoz poddtoli mhunn yead doura. Tuka ti poddtoli. Ani zori torui sthanik chai val'lya khatir bribe. Tankam sadharanponnani sogllem mahit asta.
